actions.committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

official_title: A bill to prohibit the Secretary of the Interior from issuing oil and gas leases on certain portions of the Outer Continental Shelf off the State of Florida.

summary.text: Prohibits the Secretary of the Interior from engaging in any leasing activity or approving any exploration or development plans with respect to submerged lands on certain portions of the Outer Continental Shelf off the State of Florida. Directs the Secretary to issue guidelines for the United States to buy back any existing lease on such lands. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: A bill to prohibit the Secretary of the Interior from issuing oil and gas leases on certain portions of the Outer Continental Shelf off the State of Florida.
